title: Sankarea Undying Love Unrated [1080p] [Dual Audio] [Chrisazter]
description:
This is an op by Chrisazter213 on Nyaa. #487948
OP>--------------------------------------------------------------------------
First off thanks to [Doki] for the Japanese Audio, Custom Subs for Japanese Audio, and 1920x1080 Video Source. Also big thanks to iPirate7 for the English Audio (ripped from watchcartoononline).

This is the unedited version{don't believe me? Check Episode 2 at 19:45....your welcome ; ) } Currently only the edited version with english audio was released by Funimation, and Funimation has no ETA on when the unedited release is coming.

The English Audio is from a webrip, but is decent quality. Also I left Japanese Audio Subs on by default because there are alot of signs in this anime, and I wasn't able to make a seperate track for Signs/Songs. English Audio is on by default and it is synced with the video perfectly! I also took the liberty of properly naming all the episodes.

I will be seeding this on my slower connection for a few hours, then I will have my faster connection going strong later tonight. Please Seed at 1:1 and enjoy : )

My Future Releases on Nyaa:
~Sword Art Online Part 4 1080p Dual Audio~whenever it is available
~S.A.O Batch Torrent- with all episodes(making sure they all are titled, and have signs/songs sub files) all depends on how busy I am might not get to do this, but i'd like to.

My Future Releases on ADC:
~One Piece : Movie 10 - Strong World DVD/Bluray Combo- Should be up 1st week in Nov.
~One Piece Season 5 Voyage 4- Should be up near end of Nov.

Other than those releases that is all I will be uploading for a while im sad to admit. I will be gone starting in December for 4-5months(Basic/Job Training for the U.S. Air Force) so during that time I will be very busy and not able to upload/download.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For those who can't wait for the official DVD/Blu rays, this is great.

Please seed and spread some love!

regards,
-jnx_r
